main event: On 14 May 1955, a bright greenish object flew an erratic course over Fargo, North Dakota.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 15 minutes,The observers noted that the object's course was erratic,The initial investigation suggested the object could be an aircraft taking off from Fargo,There were multiple reports of UFOs in the Fargo area around this time,No photographs were obtained during this specific sighting.
sighted object: a bright greenish object in the sky
